title: Textile
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved copper plate on plain weave, mordant used for red.
description:
Straight repeat of four narrative illustrations filling full width of fabric. The scenes refer to Diane de Poittiers and Henry II in the 16th century. Length of repeat: 92.5cm. (36 3/8"). 
Lengths of fabric would continue the pattern as a half drop.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile.
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved copper plate on plain weave, mordant used for red.. Gift of L'Antiquaire, Inc.. 1976-30-3-a.
